title: Ghostty 1.0
author: matrixhelix
aiHeadline: Get ready for some spooky fun with Ghostty 1.0, the latest release that's supposed to revolutionize something, but let's be real, we're all just here for the catchy name and the promise of a goodghost story, so go ahead and check it out at https://ghostty.org/ if you dare, but don't say I didn't warn you!

title: Blackcandy: Self hosted music streaming server
author: nateb2022
aiHeadline: Because who needs Spotify when you can have Blackcandy, the self-hosted music streaming server that's about to change the music game, or at least that's what the 253 commenters on Hacker News think, so if you're ready to take your music streaming to the next level, head on over to https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy and join the party!

title: Egui â€“ An immediate mode GUI written in Rust
author: josephcsible
aiHeadline: Rust enthusiasts rejoice, Egui is here to bring a spark of excitement to your lives with its immediate mode GUI, because who doesn't love a good GUI, and the fact that it's written in Rust just makes it all the more thrilling, so go ahead and check out https://www.egui.rs/ to see what all the fuss is about, but don't forget to wear your party hat!

title: A Minecraft server written in COBOL
author: notamy
aiHeadline: In a bizarre turn of events, someone has decided to write a Minecraft server in COBOL because, why not, and the result is CobolCraft, a project that's equal parts fascinating and terrifying, so if you're feeling brave, head on over to https://github.com/meyfa/CobolCraft and see what kind of ancient programming magic you can conjure up!

title: Differential Growth Addon for Blender
author: kelseyfrog
aiHeadline: Blender users, assemble, because the Differential Growth Addon is here to take your 3D modeling game to the next level, with all sorts of fancy features and whatnot, so if you're ready to unleash your inner artist, check out https://boris.okunskiy.name/posts/blender-differential-growth and get ready to create some masterpiece, or at the very least, something that won't make you cry yourself to sleep at night!
